greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First differences of A004125.
comment: It appears that (1) a(n)=0 if and only if n is a power of 2 and (2) a(n)=n-1 if and only if n+1 is a prime. (This has been verified for the first 2000 terms.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _John W. Layman_, Jul 19 2006
